sentences.en: a child’s first encounter with books
A fortunate encounter brought the two friends together after a long separation.
sentences.cn: 两位老朋友长期分离这次才有幸相遇.

sentences.en: Did you encounter anyone in the building?
sentences.cn: 你在大楼里遇到谁了么？

sentences.en: Every day of our lives we encounter stresses of one kind or another.
sentences.cn: 我们在每天的生活中会面临这样或那样的压力。

sentences.en: I had a frightening encounter with a poisonous snake.
sentences.cn: 我曾意外地遇到过一条毒蛇,吓得我要命.

sentences.en: If you undertake the project, you are bound to encounter difficulties.
sentences.cn: 如果你承接这项工程的话, 免不了会遇到许多困难.

sentences.en: In high school, I was very unpopular, and I did encounter a little prejudice.
sentences.cn: 上中学的时候，我很不受欢迎，确实受到了一些歧视。

sentences.en: It was a bloody encounter between the two armies.
sentences.cn: 这是那两军之间的一次激烈的遭遇战.

sentences.en: My working days were spent mooning round his department, trying to sneak a chance encounter.
sentences.cn: 上班时我在他的部门转来转去，暗中寻找巧遇他的机会。

sentences.en: One of the most unexpected surprises was my encounter with a race of arachnid creatures.
sentences.cn: 最意想不到的发现之一是我与一族蜘蛛类生物的相遇。

sentences.en: Our wildlife trips offer a thrilling encounter with wildlife in its natural state.
sentences.cn: 野生动物园之旅使我们得以接触自然状态下的野生动物，让人感觉很刺激。

sentences.en: She didn’t remember our encounter last summer.
sentences.cn: 她不记得我和她去年夏天那次邂逅了。

sentences.en: The author tells of a remarkable encounter with a group of South Vietnamese soldiers.
sentences.cn: 作者讲述了和一群南越士兵的奇遇。

sentences.en: The difficulties women encounter with their doctors partly explain why so many of us are looking to alternative therapies.
sentences.cn: 我们很多人都寄望于替代疗法，个中原因从女性看医生所遇到的困难可知一二。

sentences.en: The doctor had encountered several similar cases in the past.
sentences.cn: 那位医生过去曾碰到过好几个类似病例。

sentences.en: The thing was difficult to encounter, and she had a few days.
sentences.cn: 找工作太为难了, 她还有几天可拖.

sentences.en: The two of them had an encounter of wits.
sentences.cn: 他们俩偶然地展开了一场斗智.

sentences.en: You'll have little patience with the hypocrisy and double standards you encounter.
sentences.cn: 你将会无法忍受所遭遇的伪善和双重标准。
